pageContext.claim: “I'm honored to be here with many of the great American workers as we take historic action to accelerate the incredible revival of American manufacturing. It truly is a revival. Nobody thought it was possible, actually. And not only is it possible, but we’re thriving.”
pageContext.analysis: Manufacturing job gains that began under President Barack Obama have continued mostly at the same pace under Trump. The number of manufacturing jobs in the United States has slowly recovered from the Great Recession but is still almost 1 million jobs below the level when the recession started in December 2007.
